weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A simple, easily concealed blade. Can be thrown in a pinch.

weapons.name: Sword
weapons.description: A balanced and reliable blade. Can be wielded with one or two hands.

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.description: A massive, heavy blade that requires two hands and significant strength to wield effectively. It can cleave through armor.

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.description: A long polearm that can keep enemies at a distance.

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.description: A massive, two-handed hammer designed to shatter armor and fortifications.

weapons.name: Gauntlets
weapons.description: Armored gloves for brutal, close-quarters fighting.

weapons.name: Whip
weapons.description: A flexible weapon that can be used to trip and entangle foes from a distance.

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.description: A light, versatile bow, suitable for skirmishing.

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: A powerful bow for a dedicated archer, capable of hitting targets at a great distance.

weapons.name: Crossbow
weapons.description: A powerful, armor-piercing ranged weapon that requires time to reload.

weapons.name: Sling
weapons.description: A simple leather sling for hurling stones.

weapons.name: Heavy Club
weapons.description: A heavy, simple weapon for bludgeoning foes.

armor.name: Gambeson
armor.description: Padded cloth armor that offers basic protection.

armor.name: Studded Leather
armor.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.

armor.name: Scale Mail
armor.description: A suit of overlapping metal scales.

shields.name: Heavy Shield
shields.description: A large, sturdy shield that grants a bonus when you Stand Guard.

adventuring_gear.name: Adventurer's Kit
adventuring_gear.description: A backpack containing a bedroll, a mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, and a waterskin.

adventuring_gear.name: Rope (50 ft.)
adventuring_gear.description: A sturdy length of hemp rope.

consumables.name: Healing Salve
consumables.move: When you apply this salve to a wounded creature, they heal 2 Harm.

consumables.name: Smoke Bomb
consumables.description: A clay sphere packed with alchemical reagents.
consumables.move: When you throw this, it creates a thick cloud of smoke, providing cover and a chance to escape or reposition.

consumables.name: Bandages
consumables.description: A roll of clean cloth for first aid.
consumables.move: When you take a few moments to apply these, you can help an ally who has been taken out of a scene. They are no longer dying, but remain unconscious.

consumables.name: Herbal Poultice
consumables.move: When you apply this, you or an ally can heal 1 Harm, but it takes your whole turn to prepare and use.
